SELECT BASE_APPMT_NM as baseAppmtNm ,APPMT_PSTEP as appmtPstep ,APPMT_JOBTT as appmtJobtt ,CURR_DEPT as currDept ,YY_PSTEP as yyPstep ,APPMT_JOBCL as appmtJobcl ,APPMT_JOBCL_NM as appmtJobclNm ,BASE_APPMT_CD as baseAppmtCd ,CURR_DEPT_NM as currDeptNm ,APPMT_DEPT as appmtDept ,APPMT_DEPT_NM as appmtDeptNm ,REASON as reason ,NOTE as note ,PAY as pay ,APPMT_JOBRK as appmtJobrk ,APPMT_JOBRK_NM as appmtJobrkNm ,EMP_NO as empNo ,APPMT_SEQ as appmtSeq ,EMP_NM as empNm FROM HA_APPMT_DETAIL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HA_APPMT_DETAIL ( APPMT_SEQ, EMP_NO, CURR_DEPT, CURR_DEPT_NM, APPMT_PSTEP, BASE_APPMT_CD, BASE_APPMT_NM, YY_PSTEP, PAY, APPMT_JOBTT, APPMT_JOBCL, APPMT_JOBCL_NM, APPMT_JOBRK, APPMT_JOBRK_NM, APPMT_DEPT, APPMT_DEPT_NM, REASON, NOTE, EMP_NM ) VALUES ( #{appmtSeq}, #{empNo}, #{currDept}, #{currDeptNm}, #{appmtPstep}, #{baseAppmtCd}, #{baseAppmtNm}, #{yyPstep}, #{pay}, #{appmtJobtt}, #{appmtJobcl}, #{appmtJobclNm}, #{appmtJobrk}, #{appmtJobrkNm}, #{appmtDept}, #{appmtDeptNm}, #{reason}, #{note}, #{empNm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HA_APPMT SET APPMTYN ='Y' WHERE APPMT_SEQ=#{appmtSeq} AND EMP_NM=#{empNm}
